title: AI Resume Analyser
description: A Streamlit-powered app that analyses resumes using AI. It extracts text from PDF resumes, processes them with NLP, and evaluates skills, keywords, and formatting against job requirements.

title: Sales Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard analyzing Walmart sales data with KPIs, trends, and predictive insights. Built using Python, Pandas, and visualization libraries.

title: Web Portfoilo
description: The very site you’re browsing now ✨ — a responsive personal portfolio built with Flask, Bootstrap, and clean UI design.

title: Movie Recommendation App
description: A Streamlit app that recommends similar movies using TF-IDF on overview + genres and cosine similarity. No external APIs needed.

title: EduBot - Personal Learning Assistant
description: A Streamlit-based AI tutor that helps students learn a subject interactively. Features include chat-based Q&A, topic summaries, quiz generation, and progress tracking. Uses GPT for AI-powered responses and recommendations.

title: Personal Expense Tracker
description: A Streamlit-based personal finance app to track daily expenses, categorize spending, visualize trends, and export reports. Features include adding expenses, viewing tables, generating summary charts, and downloading CSV reports.
